tooltip.ancientmagicks.witch_arrow: Launches a small damaging magical projectile that flies towards enemies
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fireball: Launches a fiery orb that explodes into flames upon collision
tooltip.ancientmagicks.telekinetic_grab: Pulls targeted dropped items towards you
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fly: Grant yourself or target ally the ability to fly or force a target enemy to slowly rise into the air for a brief moment
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_zombie: Summons a subservient Zombie next to you
tooltip.ancientmagicks.teleport: Teleport a short distance towards anywhere you can see
tooltip.ancientmagicks.wind_burst: Causes a sudden burst of wind to blow past you and towards where you're looking at lifting ANYONE caught in it into the air
tooltip.ancientmagicks.mage_armor: Grant yourself or an unarmored target ally some protection. Protection ends if any armor is worn
tooltip.ancientmagicks.call_thunder: Direct a powerful lightning strike towards where you're looking. The lightning will always hit a surface
tooltip.ancientmagicks.polymorph: Transform a target creature into a harmless sheep. This transformation is not reversible
tooltip.ancientmagicks.chaotic_polymorph: Transform a target creature into another RANDOM creature. This transformation is not reversible
tooltip.ancientmagicks.feather_fall: Grant all nearby creatures slower falling speed
tooltip.ancientmagicks.numb_pain: Numb all pain from target creature or yourself briefly preventing all damage taken. Damage taken is stored and is taken when the effect ends
tooltip.ancientmagicks.alacrity: Hasten yourself or a target ally causing them to do most actions faster momentarily
tooltip.ancientmagicks.spook: Silence all footsteps and prevent non-lethal falling damage for yourself or a target ally
tooltip.ancientmagicks.ghostwalk: Perfectly conceal yourself or a targeted ally hiding all worn equipment and running particles
tooltip.ancientmagicks.ice_wall: Channel a stream of frost to build up walls of ice
tooltip.ancientmagicks.mind_control: Force a target creature to fight for you momentarily
tooltip.ancientmagicks.blizzard: Channel to conjure an ice storm to damage enemies in an area you're targeting
tooltip.ancientmagicks.sleep: Put a target enemy to sleep
tooltip.ancientmagicks.dragon_breath: Channel to breathe damaging flames like a dragon
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_death_knig: Summons a subservient Death Knight next to you
tooltip.ancientmagicks.icicle: Launches an icicle that damages enemies
tooltip.ancientmagicks.slimeball: Launches a Slimeball that bounces from walls and other surfaces and damages hit enemies
tooltip.ancientmagicks.vermin_bane: Spew forth a mist that only damages arthropods
tooltip.ancientmagicks.darkvision: Enable an ally or yourself to see clearly in the dark
tooltip.ancientmagicks.freeze_lance: Launches a freezing lance that damages and pierces an enemy
tooltip.ancientmagicks.burn_lance: Launches a burning lance that damages and pierces an enemy
tooltip.ancientmagicks.thunderball: Launches a ball of lightning that strikes enemies in an area
tooltip.ancientmagicks.teleblock: Prevent a target enemy from teleporting for a short duration
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fire_bolt: Launches a small fiery bolt that damages and burns hit enemies
